description: "Plan of the pier at the port of Batavia (Jakarta). Lines indicate the changing position of the beach and the sandbank over the years, and numbers show the water depth (red numbers=measured in the year 1823, blue=1831 and black=1864)."
title: "Situatie-teekening van de havendammen te Batavia met aanduiding van de diepten bij de in de oosterdam zijnde coupure"
